email_body: He joined the group 2 weeks ago. Put him in my cost center. From: Edie Leschber 01/02/2001 05:48 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Financial Group - Gas Team John, Is there a man by the name of Henry (Dutch) Quigley who will be working in your group? His name was not on the list I sent to you previously, but he showed up on another list from HR as being assigned to your group. Please let me know and I will make any necessary adjustments to your cost center for him. Thank you, Edie Leschber X30669
